lines.text:
[points out a Ferrari to steal]
How about this one?

[disdainfully]
Italian trash... besides, I only steal Porsches.
It's like an ICBM. You're never gonna use the fucker, but you sleep better at night knowing that you have one.
[the car phone in the Porsche rings]
Hello? No, Rick is not here. Who am I? The guy stealing Rick's car...
I wanna go back and get that car.
Awww, c'mon, what are you? Out of your mind?
